title: HMY Yachts - Algolia Search Integration
description: Integrated use of instantsearch.js API from the 3rd Party Service Algolia. This uses a react.js based javascript API to connect several services to gether to serve end-users accurate and helpful search results.

title: Fleet Advantage - Comparative Cost Calculator
description: Reproduction of a clients excel based spreadsheet marketing tools. Utilizes JSON, jQuery, ColdFusion

title: Bertram - Build A Boat
description: Client product configurator. Utilizes jQuery to manage transparent image assets to create a unique customer experience, layered image data is converted to a single PNG.

title: JetBoatPilot - Product Estimator
description: Client multi-step product configurator. Created a simple to use interface that gives both the client and end-user a customized product price with options. Uses jQuery, JSON, ColdFusion

title: Sonic Boats - 3D Model Viewer
description: Integrated jQuery with Three.js to load 3rd Party 3D model data into a WebGL interface to let users customize the client's product.

title: Fleet Advantage - Fuel Break Even Calculator
description: Reproduction of client's excel based spreadsheet marketing tools.
